message.content: {"given_definition_quality":42,"better_definition":"doctor; a person who treats sick people","sentence":"医生在家。","image_prompt":"A warm-toned, soft apocalypse animation style image depicting a Chinese doctor in a white coat inside a simple home, possibly checking on someone or standing in a cozy room. The scene outside the house should subtly hint at an apocalypse, like distant ruined buildings, but keep the focus on the peaceful interior. The doctor should appear calm and caring. Chinese characters '医生在家。' in a gentle font at the bottom.","sentence_translation":"The doctor is at home."}
